name: Late Bloom - LD43
description:
After giving up on your stable career as a humble worker bee, you decide to pursue your life long dream of becoming a florist. Meeting some interesting customers on the way.

- Move around with WASD/Arrow keys
- Restock your flowers
- Talk to your cool customers
- Sell flowers from the checkout
- The more you talk to your customers the more they pay for their flowers

Audio Credits:

Sonniss.com GDC 2016 Game Audio Bundle
Kevin Mcleod - Jazz Brunch
